mods.abstract: Temple of Isis and Kiosk of Trajan from Island of Bigga at Luxor, East Thebes (New Kingdom Dynasty XVIII); small and large palm trees on Island of Bigga (foreground) Nile River and boat (middle ground); pylon of Temple of Isis and Kiosk of Trajan before Aswan flooding, quarries (background); "908. Phylae de la Rive Orientale J.P. Sebah" in white along bottom of print.

titleInfo.title: Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Century Images of Egypt

location.physicalLocation: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture
